message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
You can have a smaller share, but I'm still the better negotiator!
Meet me in the middle, let's make a deal!
You're getting desperate, I'm not giving up yet!
Let's make a deal before things get worse!
I'm not going to give you the better deal, you'll have to wait
Last chance, I'll take a small share, but don't expect me to beg!
You're getting low, I'm taking what's left
